Html:
Man I have been having such trouble figuring this out!! xD

For my task i have to write a program that can record both the microphone and audio playback to hear both sides of the conversation. I have had no problem recording the microphone, but how to i record the audio playback?!?! Any ideas?!

Thanks in advance for the help!
with Windows Vista and above you can capture the system audio using WasapiLoopbackCapture. Note that you capture nothing if no sound is being played.

Thank you Markheath! with that bit of info, you sent me to the right place! with a bit more research i figured what the heck that was and was able to successfully capture both audio sources! thanks man!
